title: Rayman Legends
notes: Game install okay from Steam. On first startup installs Uplay, and seems to update Uplay. When starting the game, there is a Wine window with a Uplay icon, but no Uplay launcher graphics or function. Can't start the game itself.

title: Rayman Legends
notes:
UPlay start but it's impossible to connect to an account due to this error: A Ubisoft service is currently unavailable. You can try again later or switch to offline mode.

But impossible to connect on offline mode if I never connect a first time.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Works perfectly when bypassing Uplay. Had to make the Uplay replacement .dll files immutable to prevent them from getting overwritten by Steam.
title: Rayman® Legends

notes: Game runs through initial setup upon first start. Once through to starting the Uplay software, the window never properly loads.
title: Rayman® Legends

notes: UPlay start but it's impossible to connect to an account, It shows: A Ubisoft service is currently unavailable. You can try again later or switch to offline mode, but offline mode doesn't work either
